Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Lake. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Lake. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
